name: The Home Depot, Inc.
summary: The Home Depot, Inc. is the largest home improvement retailer in the United States, offering tools, construction products, appliances, and related services across North America. Founded in 1978 and headquartered in Atlanta, it operates thousands of big-box stores and serves both DIY consumers and professional contractors. Home Depot is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker HD and consistently ranks among the top U.S. retailers by revenue and market capitalization.
